original_text: Then the Lord reached out his hand and touched my mouth and said to me, “I have put my words in your mouth.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 손을 내밀어 내 입에 대시며 여호와께서 내게 이르시되 보라 내가 내 말을 네 입에 두었노라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord reached out his hand
I have put my words in your mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 말을 네 입에 두었노라
